summary: Personality/onboarding app with a guided "Begin the journey" flow collecting user profile info, then MBTI (known or take test), and landing on a home screen that prominently shows the user's avatar/profile and provides access to all options.
architectural_notes: Onboarding flow order: Profile info -> MBTI known? (branch to MBTI test if unknown) -> auto-route to Home.
known_issues: Current onboarding flow jumps directly to asking for name/avatar/perspectives/interests and does not correctly prompt for MBTI known vs take test in the desired sequence.
Known issue: user must press an extra Continue instead of auto-navigating to Home after onboarding/MBTI.

existing_features.title: Update the authenticated LandingPage "Begin Your Journey" action so it routes to the onboarding flow starting with profile setup (name, avatar, perspectives, interests) rather than directly to the MBTI quiz.

After the profile setup step completes (saving name/avatar/perspectives/interests), insert an MBTI decision step that asks whether the user already knows their MBTI type or wants to take the MBTI test; only show the MBTI quiz questions if the user chooses to take the test.

Ensure the MBTI step completes the onboarding flow by automatically navigating to the Home screen after the user finishes the MBTI step (either by saving a known MBTI type, saving a computed quiz result, or skipping saving), without requiring an extra "Continue" on a separate screen.
Update the Home screen to prominently show the current userâ€™s avatar and profile (at minimum: avatar + display name) centered in the middle of the Home screen.
Ensure the Home screen provides navigation access to every main option/section available in the app routes (not just a subset), so users can reach each feature from Home.

new_feature_requests.summary: Adjust onboarding sequence: after initial name/avatar/perspectives/interests, ask whether user knows MBTI type or wants to take the MBTI test; only show MBTI questions if they don't know.
After completing onboarding/MBTI flow, automatically navigate to the Home screen without requiring an extra Continue press.
Update Home screen layout to show user's avatar and profile centered prominently.
Ensure every main option/feature is accessible from the Home screen (all options present on home).

projectName: Fix onboarding flow: MBTI known-vs-test step, auto-redirect to Home, and center profile on Home with all options
